dicomDescription.title: DICOM Description
dicomDescription.description: Textual description of the DICOM entity

dcmMaxRetries.title: Maximum Number of Retries
dcmMaxRetries.description: Maximal number of retries to process tasks scheduled in a specific queue.

dcmRetryDelay.title: Retry Delay
dcmRetryDelay.description: Delay to retry to process tasks scheduled in a specific queue in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS.

dcmMaxRetryDelay.title: Maximum Retry Delay
dcmMaxRetryDelay.description: Maximal Delay to retry to process tasks scheduled in a specific queue in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS. Infinite if absent.

dcmRetryDelayMultiplier.title: Retry Delay Multiplier
dcmRetryDelayMultiplier.description: Multiplier in % that will take effect on top of dcmRetryDelay with dcmMaxRetryDelay to be taken into account.

dcmRetryOnWarning.title: Retry on Warning
dcmRetryOnWarning.description: Enables retries to process tasks not only on failure but also on a warning outcome status in a specific queue.

dcmRetryInProcessOnStartup.title: Retry IN PROCESS on Startup
dcmRetryInProcessOnStartup.description: Indicates to retry tasks left in status IN PROCESS on system start-up.

dcmPurgeQueueMessageCompletedDelay.title: Delay for purging completed queue messages
dcmPurgeQueueMessageCompletedDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which completed queue messages are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmPurgeQueueMessageFailedDelay.title: Delay for purging failed queue messages
dcmPurgeQueueMessageFailedDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which failed queue messages are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmPurgeQueueMessageWarningDelay.title: Delay for purging warning queue messages
dcmPurgeQueueMessageWarningDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which warning queue messages are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmPurgeQueueMessageCanceledDelay.title: Delay for purging canceled queue messages
dcmPurgeQueueMessageCanceledDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which canceled queue messages are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmMaxQueueSize.title: Maximum Queue Size
dcmMaxQueueSize.description: Maximal number of scheduled tasks in the queue. If the number of scheduled tasks reaches the limit, an attempt to schedule another tasks will fail. 0 = no limitation.
